Framing the business plan and its implementation on ground Track project costs in order to meet budget. Ensure project quality is as per market standards and team is well trained. Handling client and its satisfaction Utilize industry best practices, techniques, and digital adoption throughout entire project execution. .

column2: Job Title: Civil Engineer Job Description: We are seeking a motivated and dynamic Civil Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering and 0-2 years of work experience in the civil engineering field. Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, are essential for this role. Responsibilities: Assist senior engineers in project planning, and implementation. Conduct site visits and surveys to gather data for projects. Prepare detailed engineering ,construction road  and highway. Perform calculations for structural analysis. Collaborate with contractors, and other stakeholders to ensure project success. Monitor construction progress and quality to ensure compliance with design specifications and regulations. Assist in the preparation of project proposals, reports, and presentations. Stay updated with industry standards, regulations, and best practices. Participate in team meetings and contribute ideas to improve project outcomes. Adhere to safety protocols and standards on construction sites. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering from an accredited institution. 0-2 years of relevant work experience in civil engineering. Proficiency in MS-office. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment. Attention to detail and ability to multitask. Knowledge of relevant codes, regulations, and standards. Willingness to travel to project sites and work in varied environments. Eager to learn and grow in the field of civil engineering. This position offers an exciting opportunity for a recent graduate or early-career professional to gain hands-on experience in civil engineering projects and contribute to the success of our team. If you meet the qualifications and are ready to take on new challenges, we encourage you to apply. send your updated cv:- asthatgs@gmail.com
column11: Civil Construction, Civil Engineering, Civil Project, Civil Project Management, Construction Engineering

column1: Civil Engineer/ Electrician - Petrol Pump Construction Projects
column2: 1. Civil Engineer - Petrol Pump Construction   Projects  (Relocation Required) Polymers India is seeking qualified Civil Engineers and Electricians to join our team and oversee the construction of petrol pumps across various locations in India. Civil Engineer Responsibilities: * Prepare and review civil engineering plans for petrol pump construction projects * Ensure compliance with all local building codes and safety regulations * Conduct site inspections and monitor construction progress * Manage project budgets and timelines * Coordinate with subcontractors and vendors, including electricians for electrical installations * Prepare and maintain accurate measurement sheets for completed civil works * Prepare and submit reports Civil Engineer Qualifications: * Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering * Minimum 2 years of experience in civil engineering construction * Experience in petrol pump construction a plus * Strong understanding of building codes and safety regulations * Excellent communication and interpersonal skills * Proficient in AutoCAD and other civil engineering software * Experience with preparing and interpreting quantity take-offs and measurement sheets 2. Electrician for Manufacturing Unit and Site Works : Responsibilities: * Install, maintain, and repair electrical systems for petrol pumps, including control panels, lighting fixtures, and house wiring * Understand and adhere to electrical codes and safety regulations * Test and troubleshoot electrical problems * Read and interpret electrical schematics and blueprints * Collaborate with civil engineers and other construction personnel Electrician Qualifications: * Diploma or Associate's degree in Electrical Engineering or relevant trade school certification * Minimum 2 years of experience in commercial electrical construction * Knowledge of industrial load distribution * Experience with electrical control panels and lighting systems preferred * Strong understanding of electrical safety practices * Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Benefits: * Competitive salary and benefits package * Relocation assistance * Opportunity to work on challenging and rewarding projects To Apply: Please submit your resume and cover letter to [email protected] Note: This position requires relocation to a different city within India. This combined job description outlines the responsibilities and qualifications for both Civil Engineer and Electrician roles involved in petrol pump construction projects. By including both profiles, you can attract candidates with the necessary expertise for your construction needs.
column11: Site Civil Engineer, Project Execution, Site Management, Site Planning, Civil Project Management, Site Execution

column2: JOB DESCRIPTION     NAME OF THE POST :- PROJECT ENGINEER     Key Roles / Responsibilities:    1. To handle entire project activities viz. Supervision of Erection & commissioning of GIC silo system which includes FBT silos, HBT silos with Material handling Equipments, Electrical Cabling of MCC & PLC Panels (Automation).   2. Carry out site activities as per GA Layout, GA drawings & as per scope of work and ensure timely completion of project in budget cost. 3. To maintain the quality of erection work at site     Qualifications & Skills:   The candidate should be Graduate (BE/B.Tech) in Mechanical Engineering having Minimum 4 Years experience in same field or Diploma in Mechanical Engineering having Minimum 6 Years experience in same field. This position is for PAN India. There are various sites at various location all across the India. Candidate have to travel to various sites to visit at project site for project erection activities.  Our Projects are in following states: Uttar Pradesh Madhya Pradesh Gujrat Maharashtra Odisha West Bengal Rajasthan Karnataka Haryana Andhra Pradesh Jammu Kashmir Bihar Jharkhand Tamil Ndu Assam Telangana

column2: Unipro Techno Infrastructure Pvt Ltd is a dynamic and forward-thinking company dedicated to delivering high-quality construction and engineering solutions to our clients . We are seeking a dynamic and motivated Junior Engineer - Civil to join our team and contribute to the successful execution of our projects.  Role & responsibilities :   Assist senior engineers in the planning, design, and execution of civil engineering aspects of water treatment projects.  Conduct site surveys, assessments, and investigations to gather relevant data for project planning and implementation.  Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams including mechanical engineers, architects, and project managers to ensure integrated project delivery.  Monitor construction activities on-site to ensure compliance with project specifications, quality standards, and safety regulations.   Conduct field tests, inspections, and quality assurance checks to verify the performance and integrity of civil structures and components.  Assist in resolving technical issues, design changes, and construction challenges encountered during project execution. Stay updated with the latest developments in civil engineering technologies, materials, and construction methodologies to enhance project efficiency and effectiveness. Qualifications :   Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering or related field from an accredited institution. Previous experience or internship in civil engineering, preferably in water treatment projects, is advantageous.  Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, or other relevant design software is desirable. Knowledge of relevant industry codes, standards, and regulations.  Willingness to travel to project sites as required.

column2: All the engineering design and analysis required for a project including member design, connection design, handling and transportation, detailing, etc. Create efficient and economic designs that are constructible Communicates internally with lead drafter, project manager, sales, estimating, production, and erection during throughout the project Communicates externally with Structural Engineer of Record and the Architect Perform various engineering checks during each phase of the drafting process to ensure engineering design and detailing is being followed Organize and maintain the project calculations in an orderly and professional manner Assist the production department with questions and or issues Design concrete repairs for remedial action when required Occasional site visit to perform a Field Report to ensure pieces are installed correctly and connections are being made per the erection details

Roles and Responsibilities: Inspect, clean, and maintain construction tools, machinery, and equipment to ensure proper functioning and safety compliance. Organize and inventory tools and equipment, keeping track of their usage and maintenance schedules. Assist with loading and unloading equipment at job sites, ensuring proper handling and secure transportation. Coordinate with project managers, contractors, and team members to ensure tools and equipment are available and ready for use. Train and mentor new employees on safe and efficient handling of tools and equipment. Identify and report any equipment malfunctions or safety hazards to supervisors promptly. Identify cost-saving opportunities without compromising quality or safety standards. Provide regular project updates and reports to clients, fostering transparency and trust. Qualifications: Any Bachelor's degree. Proven experience in construction tools and equipment handling, with a focus on safety and efficiency. Knowledge of construction tools, machinery, and equipment, including maintenance and repair procedures. Excellent communication skills. Ability to work independently. Benefits: Competitive salary. Professional development opportunities.

column1: Manager - Projects @ Croma - A TATA Enterprise
column2: Position: Manager Projects (Band 5) Location: Andheri East (Corporate Office) Reporting to : Head- Projects & Maintenance Role & Responsibilities:   Co-ordinating with the vendors, contractors,  accounts and finance team w.r.t timely bill settlement. Preparing DPR/WPR/MPR (Daily Progress Report) with other reports and submitting the same to H.O.D for review. Co-ordinating with the consultants, designers & contractors for drawings required if any. Co-ordination with internal and external auditors wrt to Capex Reviews and queries. Ensuring & assisting in budget and risk management. Co-ordinating with internal as well as external stakeholders for timely delivery of materials at the site. Should have basic knowledge of MEP works. Assisting Project Manager in preparing the BOQ for Civil/Interior work/MEP works. Raising PR/SR(Purchase Requisition) in SAP for the bought-out materials etc. required at the site. Checking R.A.bills, measurement sheets of the contractors, and assisting the Project Manager in the closure of final bills of site. Ensure roadblocks are communicated to all internal stakeholders and assist in removing the same. Knowledge of SAP, MIS, Excel, PowerPoint and AutoCAD, etc. is a must. Should have sound knowledge of materials and their rates used for construction activities. Good negotiation skills are required. Good communication & Collaboration skills are required. Key metrics will therefore be TAT, Precise communication & Collaboration with internal & external stakeholders. Serve as the primary point of contact for stakeholders, providing regular updates on project status, milestones  & Budgetary concerns. Strong aptitude and analytical skills. Education B. Arch or B.E Civil/B.E Electrical.   Minimum 6 to 12 years of experience in project management. Minimum 3  4 Years in site execution.
